alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 4:50AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN PASQUOTANK...PERQUIMANS... EASTERN BERTIE...SOUTHEASTERN HERTFORD...SOUTHERN GATES AND CHOWAN COUNTIES THROUGH 530 AM EST... At 450 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Harrellsville to near Colerain to near Williamston. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Windsor, Ryland, Colerain, Rockyhock, Tyner, Valhalla, and Hobbsville around 455 AM EST. Belvidere around 500 AM EST. Hertford and Winfall around 505 AM EST. Chapanoke around 510 AM EST. Elizabeth City and Morgans Corner around 515 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Goose Pond, Whites Crossroads, Gliden, Newsome Store, Arrowhead Beach, Peach, Parkville, Mount Gould, Hancock, and Nicanor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans
